message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $100? That's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $85 is too low for me. I can go down to $95, but that's my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $95 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $87.50 for the product. That's my final offer.
